episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1101_0100_:
In the city, Professor Oak held a lecture for
Trainers who have Eevee as partner Pokémon.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0200_: Everyone, get along with your Eevee!
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0300_:
Thank you all for coming as well! Everyone was
happy to see how Eevee evolve.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0400_: Not at all, Professor Oak. I’m glad we could help!
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0500_: We learned a lot from the lecture, too!
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0600_:
It seems like Vaporeon and the others are happy
to play with everyone, too.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0700_:
By the way, why did you all want your Eevee to
evolve the way they did?
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_0900_:
When Flareon was an Eevee, it seemed like he
admired my Infernape...
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1000_: so I thought Flareon was the best choice for him.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1100_:
Same for me! My Eevee was close friends
with Marill.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1200_:
She’s really helpful when we go on adventures
near water.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1300_:
In my case, I struggled a lot with fast Pokémon
when I was traveling around Johto.
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1400_:
So I thought if my Eevee became Jolteon,
she could be really reliable. Jolteon was
happy to do so, too!
episode_event_eevee_2022/4001_1001_1600_:
Hmm... There’s always an interesting history
behind people and Pokémon!
episode_event_eevee_2022/6801_1001_0100_:
It’s fascinating that there are so many ways Eevee
can evolve.
episode_event_eevee_2022/6801_1001_0200_:
I agree. You can get a feel for how mysterious
and wondrous these Pokémon are.
